import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./dealForm.css"; class dealForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ Image: null, url: null } this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange = e =>{ if(e.target.files[0]){ const image = e.target.files[0]; this.setState(() => ({image})) } } render() { return (
PCD ADMIN DESH-BOARD

) } } export default dealForm;
